Class TestEasyKillBotAvoidsWalls

  • java.lang.Object
    • robocode.control.events.BattleAdaptor
      • robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
        • test.TestEasyKillBotAvoidsWalls
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    robocode.control.events.IBattleListener

    public class TestEasyKillBotAvoidsWalls
extends robocode.control.testing.RobotTestBed
    Tests to determine if the robot EasyKillBot avoids walls. At this moment the EasyKillBot will fail the test as it hits the wall a lot.
    Author:
    Philip Johnson, Justin Lee
